job_application.title: Job Application
job_application.purpose: Apply for a job formally, highlight suitability, and request an interview or next steps.

opening.label: Opening: Purpose + Reference
opening.purpose: State why you are writing and where you found the opportunity.
phrases: Dear [Hiring Managerâ€™s Name],
I am writing to apply for the position of [Job Title] advertised on [Website/Platform] on [Date].
Please accept this email as my formal application for the role of [Job Title] at [Company Name].
I would like to express my interest in the vacancy for [Job Title], as advertised by [Company Name].

main.label: Main: Experience + Evidence
main.purpose: Present relevant skills, experience, and achievements with clear examples.
phrases: I believe I am well suited to this role due to my experience in [Field/Area] and my ability to [Skill/Task].
In my previous role at [Company/Organisation], I was responsible for [Responsibility], which helped me develop [Skill].
I have attached my [CV/Resume] and would like to highlight my experience in [Key Strength], particularly [Example].
One achievement I am particularly proud of is [Achievement], as it demonstrates my ability to [Competency].
I am confident that my strengths in [Skill 1] and [Skill 2] would allow me to contribute effectively to [Team/Project].

closing.label: Closing: Availability + Polite Sign-off
closing.purpose: Request next steps politely and close formally.
phrases: I would be grateful for the opportunity to discuss my application further in an interview.
Please let me know if you require any additional information or supporting documents.
Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to hearing from you.
Yours sincerely,
[Full Name]

requesting_information.title: Requesting Information
requesting_information.purpose: Ask for information politely, clearly, and in an organised way.

opening.label: Opening: Enquiry + Context
opening.purpose: Introduce the reason for contact and give context.
phrases: Dear Sir or Madam,
I am writing to enquire about [Course/Service/Product] advertised on [Website/Brochure].
I would be grateful if you could provide further information regarding [Topic].
I am contacting you in connection with [Event/Programme] taking place on [Date].

main.label: Main: Specific Questions
main.purpose: Ask focused questions and show polite interest.
phrases: Could you please clarify whether [Feature/Option] is included in the price?
I would also like to know if there are any requirements for [Eligibility/Experience].
In addition, could you confirm the deadline for [Application/Registration]?
I would appreciate details concerning [Costs/Timetable/Accommodation], including [Specific Detail].
Finally, could you advise me on the best way to [Book/Apply/Reserve]?

closing.label: Closing: Thanks + Next Steps
phrases: Thank you in advance for your assistance.
I look forward to receiving your response at your earliest convenience.
If possible, I would appreciate a reply by [Date].
Yours faithfully,
[Full Name]

complaint.title: Making a Complaint
complaint.purpose: Complain politely but firmly, explain the problem, and request a solution.

opening.label: Opening: Reason + Reference
opening.purpose: State you are complaining and reference the purchase/service clearly.
phrases: Dear Customer Service Team,
I am writing to complain about [Product/Service] which I purchased on [Date] from [Branch/Website].
I am contacting you regarding an issue with [Order Number/Booking Reference].
Unfortunately, I am dissatisfied with the service I received on [Date] at [Location].

main.label: Main: Problem + Impact + Evidence
main.purpose: Explain what went wrong, the impact, and any evidence.
phrases: The main issue is that [Problem], which is unacceptable given [Expectation/Policy].
As a result of this, I have been inconvenienced because [Impact].
To make matters worse, [Additional Problem], despite [Previous Contact/Attempt].
I enclose/attach [Receipt/Photos/Screenshots] as evidence of the problem.
I would like you to investigate this matter and explain why [Issue] occurred.

closing.label: Closing: Requested Solution
closing.purpose: Request an outcome and close firmly but politely.
phrases: I would appreciate a full refund / replacement / compensation of [Amount], in accordance with your policy.
I would be grateful if you could resolve this matter within [Timeframe].
If I do not receive a satisfactory response, I will be forced to take further action.
Yours sincerely,
[Full Name]

comparison_recommendation.title: Comparing and Recommending
comparison_recommendation.purpose: Compare options formally and recommend one with justification.

opening.label: Opening: Purpose + Options
opening.purpose: Explain the context and mention what you are comparing.
phrases: Dear [Name/Title],
I am writing in response to your request to compare [Option A] and [Option B].
As requested, I have considered the advantages and disadvantages of [Option A] and [Option B].
Thank you for asking for my opinion regarding [Choice/Decision].

main.label: Main: Comparison + Reasons
main.purpose: Compare key features logically and recommend one option.
phrases: In terms of [Criterion], [Option A] appears to be more suitable because [Reason].
However, [Option B] has the advantage of [Benefit], which may be important if [Condition].
Although [Option A] is [Positive], it may be less effective when it comes to [Weakness].
Overall, I would recommend [Option] as it offers the best balance of [Two Criteria].
Taking cost and convenience into account, [Option] seems the most practical choice.

closing.label: Closing: Final Recommendation
closing.purpose: Confirm recommendation and offer further help.
phrases: On balance, I believe [Option] would be the most appropriate choice for [Purpose].
Please let me know if you would like me to provide further details about [Option].
I hope these comments are helpful and I would be happy to discuss this further.
Yours sincerely,
[Full Name]

explaining_justifying.title: Explaining and Justifying
explaining_justifying.purpose: Explain a situation formally, justify actions, and propose solutions.

opening.label: Opening: Reason for Writing
opening.purpose: State why you are writing and reference the situation.
phrases: Dear [Name/Title],
I am writing to explain the circumstances regarding [Situation/Issue] on [Date].
I would like to clarify what happened in relation to [Event/Decision].
I am contacting you to provide an explanation for [Problem].

main.label: Main: Explanation + Justification
main.purpose: Explain clearly, take responsibility where appropriate, and justify decisions.
phrases: The reason for this was [Reason], which unfortunately resulted in [Consequence].
Although I understand that [Expectation], it was not possible to [Action] due to [Constraint].
I would like to emphasise that I took every reasonable step to [Action], including [Example].
I acknowledge that [Issue] caused inconvenience, and I apologise for any difficulties this may have caused.
To prevent this from happening again, I propose [Solution/Change].

closing.label: Closing: Solution + Polite End
closing.purpose: Offer next steps and close professionally.
phrases: I hope this explanation clarifies the situation.
Please let me know if you require any further information.
Thank you for your understanding and I look forward to your response.
Yours sincerely,
[Full Name]
